reviews.text: Okays
Nice church

Ezt a templomot kivülröl és belülről is csodálni tudom. Épitészetileg Debrecen egyik legszebb temploma, amely kisméretű téglából készült. Az ablaknyilások felett érdemes megnézni azt a csodálatos boltíveket amelyet, évtizedekkel ezelőtt készitettek. A torony és a kupola elrendezése is különleges. A bejárati részt is ajánlom mindenki figyelmébe. Belülről is egy igazi remekmű. Kedvenceim az ablakok, amelyek egy-egy Szent személyt ábrázolnak. Érdemes személyesen ellátogatni ebbe a templomba, mert a mise is egy igazi nyugalmat biztosit, rohanó világunkba.

A templombelső hangsúlyos részei Szegedi Molnár Géza festőművész 1950 – 1958 között alkotott festményei: a Kánai menyegző, az Örömhír vétele, a Szentlélek eljövetele, Szent József halála. A művész olajképei is megtalálhatók a templomban.

Az északi kereszthajóban öt Árpád-házi, a déliben öt bizánci egyházból való szentet örökített meg festett üvegablakain Mohay Attila.

A szószék, hasonlóan az oltárhoz, márvány berakásos, Bobula János tervei alapján készült, Rétay és Benedek műhelyében 1910-ben.

A görögkatolikus templomokban ritkaságnak számító orgona szekrénye a rózsaablakot úgy veszi körül, hogy az ablak szépsége és funkciója érvényesül.

A templom egyetlen harangját, a Szent Mihály főangyal tiszteletére szentelt nagyharangot 1909-ben öntötték Seltenhofer Frigyes Fiai Sopronan. Feliratának részlete: “ÖNTETETT NÉHAI POLGÁR GYÖRGY MIHÁLY ÉS NEJE NAGY ZSUZSANNA ADOMÁNYÁBÓL”. Tömege 2800 kg. Vasárnap 6.45, 8.30, 10.00, 12.00 és 17.30-kor szólal meg. A többi harangját elrekvirálták.
Gyönyörü hely igen spirituàlis és szívet melengetö. Építészet szempontjàbol gyönyörű minden szeglete egy képző művészeti remekmű
really nice helpful people here!!
Ein Besuch bei und mit Freunden führte uns unter sachkundiger Führung an diesen geschichtsträchtigen Ort. Neben der Großkirche sollte einen der touristische Weg auch hier hin führen!

A debreceni ortodox zsidó közösség késő-eklektikus, főként a románkori építészet elemeit alkalmazó homlokzatú zsinagógája 1894-ben épült, tervezője Berger Jenő debreceni építész. A zsinagóga 2015-ben teljes felújításon esett át, jelenleg nem csak szakrális tér - kiállítások, konferenciák, koncertek színhelye.
בית כנסת ומוזיאון יהודי בעיר דברצן בהונגריה שווה לבקר וחובה מומלץ בחום
בית כנסת יהודי בדברצן.
Okays
Nice church

Very nice still good shape church parking very bad specially before 5pm
Very nice church, and the clergy is very nice as well.
Warm people. Beautiful artwork inside the building
Exterior looks simple nice and the double belfry adds beauty into it.
No comment
Erős vár! Orando et Laborando!
Gyönyörű, ősi falak. Érdemes benézni

I’ve been to this museum twice now and I’m ready to go for a third time. The museum has a lot to offer when it comes to art. There are historical figures, extravagant paintings and more to see there. The atmosphere is so tranquilizing. I could walk around there for a long time and feel relaxed. There’s a lot to learn here and to see. I definitely recommend this museum to anyone who’s interested in art!

A great museum that includes a number of rooms each with different history and feeling. It is very well designed and moving from one room to the other makes you feel like you are time traveling,  definitely a great experience especially for history lovers.
This is amazing place too! 😊
Good cultural(magyar and Egyptian) and religious (Christian) galleries coupled with awesome paintings (Jesus' last super) and pictures. Ancient & midieval weapon showcased.

An unexpectedly nice museum with a great number of (various) objects excibited.  Only a few rooms have signs in English, which is a pity: there are not so many paintings and many items whose purpose is not obvious at all:)  I guess the museum's good for visitors with kids.

This museum is quite interesting, but it’s small and there isn’t a lot to see. In the first building there’s a big exhibition related to the artist, but all of it is in Hungarian. We could interpret only so much regarding the theme of each room, which was a bit disappointing, but we were still entertained. 
The other building is full of sculptures, and they have English descriptions! There’s a biography of the artist on the walls and it’s very helpful; it made the exhibit more interesting and fascinating. This building definitely has my favorite exhibit. I really enjoyed myself.
Nagyon jó programok voltak a mese kiállítással kapcsolatban.
Gyönyörű épület,  minőségi tartalommal  :). teslaelmeny.hu
Az időszaki kiállítás miatt mentünk oda, de végül a gyerekeket a szobrok varázsolták el.
kellemes meglepetés volt. a mese (b)irodalom című kiállításra mentünk, de a Medgyessy szobrai, művei is tetszettek.

Perfect place to relax, and the wellness section is decent 
Staff is polite and helpful
Wide variety of choices on menu even gluten free options

The food is average, nothing special, nothing fantastic, which is strange from a 4* hotel. No easily visible roadsigns to make it easier to find this place. In the middle of nowhere. The stuff is just okay, nothing more.
This place is look absolutely stunning! There is so much activities great food. In my opinion one of the best place in North East.
Széchenyi card is accepted. Nice little outside pool. Friendly staff menbers. Dog friendly place. Recommended as a hotel & wedding venue as well.
Modern facilities with top notch restaurant and heated spa and pool. Green grass and well kept surroundings.

Interesting milieu. Clean and cosy rooms. Close to city center. Huge display of small bottles :)

My room had a good amount of space, it was clean, had all the standard amenities, and interesting design. Staff has all been extremely nice and helpful, as I only speak English. The continental breakfast had a good variety of options and a great coffee machine. It is a reasonable walking distance to lots of shopping and restaurants. I will consider this as an option the next time I visit.
Nice and clean hotel. What siturbet me was laud windows from which everything from the street was heard in the room. I tried to order dinner but they had no option for that.

Great Hotel, friendly staff and excellent food! Cozy garden terrace, not far from town center. Great honeymoon suite, spacey and comfy enough. However a little bit tired from the aspect of maintenance. (shower, carpet, tapestry, matress) All in all an excellent choice when you decide to visit Debrecen!
It is an excellent, cosy and very customer-friendly hotel

De is a great place to work for and I am very excited about this opportunity and I look forward to working with you and your company for the opportunity to work with you and I look forward to working with you and your company for the opportunity to work with you and I look forward to ls with you and your team for the opportunity to work with then to work with you but I am not sure what to do with my current job search for a job
Once it was a beautiful building, now it looks like falling apart. The plays are of varying quality.
I was very pleased to see that the events had sold out. I overheard several people say: “I never knew this was so great, and I will definitely become a member.”
Makes you want to come back and enjoy more plays.
One of the most beautiful buildings of Debrecen
Erős vár! Orando et Laborando!
Gyönyörű, ősi falak. Érdemes benézni
Erős vár! Orando et Laborando!
Gyönyörű, ősi falak. Érdemes benézni

The location is excellent. 
If you want just to sleep here, it's a good choice. 
But the room was very simple.  Far below the promising room that is presented in the advertising film.  It also took a lot of time to heat it.  Yet-  very clean.
The (included) breakfast was poor. 
The staff at the reception was friendly and helpful.

Amazing place to stay with delicious food. 
We kept our wedding here and it was wonderful thanks to the friendly staff.
The rooms are really tidy and a bit unusual thanks to the special themes like cart, country, industrial and so on. 
I highly recommend it. :)
Great place, nice accomodation, very good restaurant and pleasant crew.
It is a traditional hungarian restaurant with old decoration tools and stuff. I didn't try the food, I drunk only a german weissbier. Prices are reasonable. It is a friendly place with great waitors.
Cozy place, good food, free parking, what else would one need

The officers are very cooperative.
They speak little English but Google Translator makes everything easy.
Phone number is not working at all, 0!

A kirendeltség egy aprócskát eldugott helyen van, ügyfélterheltsége meglehetősen nagy. Ennek ellenére dolgozói segítőkészek és készségesek az esetlegesen felmerült problémák megoldására pragmatikus, de némi rugalmasságot is mutató hivatali gèpezettel. Jó ügyintézést kívánok mindenkinek! 😊😉
Nagyon korrektek ès segìtőkèszek voltak. Gèmesi Gàbor

Értékelhetetlen. Próbálok tájékoztatást kérni az ügyfélszolgálattól, de ez minden, csak nem ügyfélszolgálat. Hívom a megadott 517-200-as telefonszámot, mondják, hogy várjak, de 1 perc múlva foglalt-jelzést ad a telefonom. Hát hogyan lehet Önöket elérni ? A 06-40-424242-es telefonnál benyomom az 1-es gombot, de a géphang mondja tovább a magáét, nem tudok eljutni senkihez, aki válaszolna a nem túl bonyolult kérdésemre. Ha értékelést várnak, akkor -1. Na, most mivel nem ömlengtem, hogy "jaj, de jó ez az ügyfélszolgálat", a közzétételt is blokkolja ez az oldal. "Gratulálok!"
A good place to have an afternoon coffee and roam around after school.  My favorite is the food truck selling pommes frites.

The Old Town Hall on Bonn's marketplace was built 1737-1780 in the style of the Rococo by the electoral court architect Michael Leveilly. The three-storey building has a mansard roof with dormers. It is listed as an architectural monument. In the Square about a day in a week there's a Market...
Good place to have some coffee or buy cheap grocery
Very nice building

Absolutely gorgeous town hall located on the market off Bonn. On the market you can buy some great food and when it is sunny have a nice cool drink on the terraces. It is easily reachable on foot and bus, tram and metro stops aren't far away.
Very well preserved and has a good Green House!!
Beautiful
Nagyon szép növényeket, fákat láttunk. Ajánlani tudom másoknak is megéri elmenni!
Békés, csendes hely, ideális kikapcsolódàsra. Egyetemi hallgatóknak ráadásul ingyenesen látogatható!
Érdekes, ápolt, szép kert egzotikus üvegházakkal. Nagyon jó , olcsó program.

Great service! Amazing people. The location is soooo good and nice and the place is very clean.  It's is very easy to find.  Great staff also.  Be sure that your needs will be met here. 

This place  is very very very good and there is good advice and there is good service and the coffee is great and the cake is also great.
A great place to go and eat and chill.

great selection of modern food, for lunch and dinner. trendy, modern bar in the evening. service friendly, speaks english. the only drawback is that you have to wait a long while until the food order arrives.
Great food. Amazing atmosphere.

It's goof but not perfect
You can choose better option with these foods price!
But still good quality and very nice staff
Well, it used to be one of the best traditional places in Debrecen. But not any more...
I like this restaurant because it is cozy, the staff is kind and polite and the serving are huge. Prices are also reasonable.
Rather tasty. Good service. Reasonable prices. Can't say that it was my best Hungarian dinner but a rather satisfying still. Loved the goulash soup
This place is supposed to serve traditional Hungarian food. It's ordinary food one could cook at home. Nothing fancy. We've eaten much better in other places in Debrecen.
Very good food. Also large portions and nice employees :)

Great simple place to eat. Comfortable, the location is very good. Just under the big church. The food is good, the gulash was great, the fish soup was good too. Big menu, self service. Overall a good place - recommended

Actually it's a nice place to sit with friends and have coffee. I didn't try food at this place..but the dessert. It was very delicious especially with the toppings of caramel and chocolate. If you sit outside, it has a very beautiful view of Yellow church which is kinda symbol of Debrecen. Recommended!!!
Big selection of foods and decent prices.
Cozy and friendly place in the heart of Debrecen, delicious food
Small fast food place.The gulash soup is not tasty, red water with some carrots. The hamburger was OK. Disappointing !
It's a good restaurant

I order and eccapted something else. 
The food was no more regular. 
The kitchen is open so everyone can smile all and its no well. 
Advise avoid
Tastiest, fresh food..excellent service, no frills !
Very unclean place, but great food! 3 stars for one positive and one negative
Decent Indian food. Worth trying.
